## GerstnerWaveGenerator.getWaveLength() method

Gets the length of the wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |

**Returns:**
